page.title: 14The Teapot Club Feast
page.content: The{Flash Loyal Union Society}is sometimes called the{Teapot}Club. Some people say it is called the Teapot Club because they kept the money to give to the sick people in a teapot. Every year they have a club feast in June. There is a banner with a picture of baby Jesus on it. The people walked behind the banner to the Travellers Rest, then they had a drink Then they walked back to the New Inn and at 4.30 p.m they had a service at the church. When the chapel was open, they went to a church service then to make it fair, the next year they went to a chapel service. Then they came back to the village hall for another tea.
